thread.title: Join Abounding Women Community Outreach, Inc. for an Inspirational & Motivational Experience at its First Annual Women's Empowerment Conference
thread.title_full: Join Abounding Women Community Outreach, Inc. for an Inspirational & Motivational Experience at its First Annual Women's Empowerment Conference - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Join Abounding Women Community Outreach, Inc. for an Inspirational & Motivational Experience at its First Annual Women's Empowerment Conference
text:
Abounding Women Community Outreach, Inc.
JERSEY CITY, N.J. , Oct. 20, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Every woman has the potential to excel and thrive in their personal and professional lives. However, a lack of self-confidence and the belief that success is only for those with special gifts, often keep women from reaching their full potential.
Abounding Women Community Outreach, Inc. is hosting a Women's Empowerment Conference on November 21 st 2015 at the Courtyard Marriott Jersey City. The theme of this conference is "Ordinary Women, Extraordinary Journeys." The goal is to get every woman to understand that successful women are ordinary people who simply believed their dreams were possible and stayed the course to achieve their goals.
Conference attendees will hear the stories of ordinary women who have had extraordinary journeys to achieve personal and professional success. Speakers will share their journeys which will inspire women to believe that success is possible for them too.
Featured performances include gospel group, J'Carter, renowned Dance Director of One Accord Dance Ministries (Harlem, NY) - Lasharn Patt , Singer Latoya White and a special poetry reading by local community activist Pamela Johnson .
Vendor Registration
Organizations interested in connecting with women in the community can reserve a vendor booth. Advance registration is strongly recommended. Please visit http://aboundingwomen.org/
Event Details
Date: November 21st, 2015
Time: 10am â€“ 2pm ET
Location: The Courtyard Marriott
540 Washington Blvd
Jersey City, NJ
Follow us on Twitter @aboundingwomen and us the hashtag #ordinarywomenextrordinaryjourney
About Abounding Women Community Outreach, Inc.
Abounding Women Community Outreach Inc. is an alliance of career women working to move the community forward. We are a non-profit organization that focuses on empowering women through community outreach initiatives, professional skills training and empowerment events.
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151020/278757-INFO
